ygData.subject: Re: 1hb weapons that are light enough to use...
ygData.msgSnippet: check out this link http://www.jrh.net/skyquests.html this is a good place also on the eqmonks messageboard there is a detail of the monk quests in PoS ...
ygData.messageBody:
check out this link

http://www.jrh.net/skyquests.html


this is a good place also on the eqmonks messageboard there is a detail of
the monk quests in PoS

> Kizmet Bayashi
